actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense and the Administrator of the General Services Administration to offer prior owners of real property on which deactivated Titan missile silos are located the right to purchase such property at fair market value.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Defense and the Administrator of the General Services Administration to offer to prior owners of real property on which deactivated Titan missile silos are located first right to repurchase such property at fairm market value.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense and the Administrator of the General Services Administration to offer prior owners of real property on which deactivated Titan missile silos are located the right to purchase such property at fair market value.
